about_the_game:
Embark on an epic journey into the depths of distant galaxies in this exciting sci-fi adventure. Humanity has expanded beyond its home planet, colonizing distant worlds in search of vital resources and habitable planets. You are tasked with exploring the far reaches of space aboard your spaceship.

Each level of the game represents a different star system, offering a wide range of tasks and challenges. From exploring new planets and mining resources to intense battles with enemy spacecrafts and aiding allies, every mission is a test of your skills and strategic thinking.

One of the key features of "Space Light" is its open-world gameplay, allowing you to freely navigate the space and chart your own course through the galaxy. Upgrade your spacecraft with a variety of enhancements to tackle increasingly formidable foes and overcome obstacles on your quest for discovery.

  • Epic Interstellar Exploration: Traverse distant galaxies and uncover the secrets hidden within each star system.
  • Dynamic Space Battles: Engage in intense space battles against enemy ships, using a variety of weapons and tactics.
  • Customizable Spaceship: Upgrade and enhance your spacecraft with a wide range of upgrades and modifications.
  • Open-World Gameplay: Immerse yourself in a huge, open universe full of varied missions and discoveries.
  • Ally Assistance: Lend a helping hand to allies you meet along the way.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 / AMD Athlon 3000G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Get ready to embark on a thrilling space adventure across the cosmos, where you'll explore new planets, engage in thrilling space battles, and shape the fate of humanity among the stars.
